MAN.TITLE: xclip

DESCRIPTION.P: xclip set a clipping zone given by the coordinates, in the current graphics scale, of the rectangle x,y,w,h (upper-left point, width, height). If only one argument is given, it stands for a rectangle specification rect=[x,y,w,h].
xclip("clipgrf") is used to clip the usual rectangle boundaries.
To unclip a region use the command xclip().
